title: Has anyone noticed yasuo hasent been really nerfed or even touched for seasons?
body: Like the playerbase clearly fucking hates him, in pretty much all games i see him banned, even in plat+. He is just obnoxious and overtuned yet nothing has been done and then we gave him a true damage keystone to use. lmao..

replies.body:
He's not touched because he's not broken, and he's been nerfed twice this season.


80% of the hate is literally just the circle-jerk for attention on the boards.

He doesn't need nerfs.

And he's getting a huge nerf on the next patch since his core items cost 200g and 300g more with also worse build path
Trying to get all my Yasuo games out the way now while he's still fun to play.
Dude do you the know the main for us yasuo E masers when that thing got nerfed.
